original_text: Let the priests take it to them, every man of his acquaintance: and let them repair the breaches of the house, wheresoever any breach shall be found.
korean_text: 제사장들이 각각 아는 자에게서 받아들여 성전의 어느 곳이든지 파손된 것을 보거든 그것으로 수리하라 하였으나

sentences.original_text: Let the priests take it to them,
and let them repair the breaches of the house,
wheresoever any breach shall be found.
